itunes:title: 254 - HOW TO: Avoid Slow Slumps / Get Published / Find and Express Your Value and MORE!
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
WARNING THIS IS A WEIRD EPISODE! THERE IS NO EDITING OR MUSIC AND I GET REAAAAAL REAL.

LET’S CUT THE CRAP.

Every once in awhile I feel the need to do an episode with NO EDITING, NO MUSIC and NO AUDIO TRICKS.

WHY? Because it’s VERY IMPORTANT to me that we forever come back to the true pulse of this show: SEEING CREATIVE PEOPLE THRIVE IN THEIR CAREERS.

ALL THE STRATEGY and BRANDING is good but sometimes it gets in between us and clouds what this is all about.

SO TODAY we strip away everything that is crowding the show and it’s just you, me and a mic. THIS IS A LOOOONG EPISODE and I GET REAL FIRED UP. There are some mindset shifts in here that I think have the potential to unlock your next career breakthrough.

Topics we cover:
- How to sustain momentum and avoid slow times and slumps
- How to get over the fear of putting yourself out there
- How to get more consistent in your style and voice
- How to get a book published
- How to find and express your value
- How do I find my audience
